law.catch_line: Duties of Attorney General, county, and Commonwealth's attorneys.
law.text: County, Commonwealth's attorneys, and the Attorney General, shall, within their respective jurisdictions, prosecute all violations of the penal provisions of the public health laws of this Commonwealth.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 46, effective January 1, 1978. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 18, effective June 17, 1954.
